topic: What heals first - body or mind

cover.headline: What heals first when you quit alcohol—your mind or your [body]?
cover.subtitle: The science of why physical recovery leads the way to mental clarity

slides.title: Your body resets first (days 1-7)
items: Heart rate and blood pressure stabilize within 72 hours
Liver enzymes begin normalizing, reducing inflammation markers
Sleep architecture disrupts before it repairs itself

slides.title: Your brain chemistry follows (weeks 2-4)
items: GABA receptors rebuild, restoring natural calm signals
Dopamine sensitivity returns, so everyday joys feel real again
Cortisol levels drop, easing that constant background anxiety

slides.title: Mental clarity arrives last (months 1-3)
items: Prefrontal cortex function improves, sharpening focus and decisions
Memory consolidation strengthens as REM sleep deepens
Emotional regulation stabilizes, making moods more predictable
